TopicTitle: Impossible contract: Rescue Kerbal from Orbit - Pol

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I got a standard orbital rescue contract. This time, it was around Pol.

Before accepting I had a look at the tracking station. Nothing.

Took the contract, went to Pol, and of course there was noone around.

Not a real surprise, every time I go to Pol, strange things happen.

Please remove Pol from the game before the final release.

Had and accepted 2 of them. They never appeared in Tracking Center. 

Not before and not after accepted contract.

One i canceled, the second (rescue... in orbit from mun) passed by hit

the target time.

Loss of money and reputation was quite low.

Don't know about this particular case, but I have seen contracts bug out like this (no kerbal to rescue etc.) from time to time. There is a 'regenerate active contracts' button somewhere in the debug menu which has, so far, fixed it every time.
